text: The Estádio do Dragão (English: Dragon Stadium) is a football stadium in Porto, Portugal. It is the home ground stadium of FC Porto since 2003. It can seat 50,033 people which makes it the third biggest stadium in Portugal. ==References== Category:2003 establishments in Europe Category:Football in Portugal Category:Football stadiums in Europe Category:Buildings and structures in Porto
title: Estádio do Dragão
